name: Mexican Table Sauce
keywords: canned tomatoes, onion, pickled jalapeño peppers, raw, vegetarian
recipeIngredient: 2 cups well-drained canned tomatoes, preferably imported

recipeInstructions.text: Put the tomatoes into the container of a food processor or electric blender. Blend until they are coarsely chopped. The tomatoes should not become too soupy. Pour the mixture into a bowl.
Add the chopped onions and coriander.
Trim off the ends of each jalapeno pepper. Do not remove the seeds. Chop the peppers and add them to the bowl. Add salt and pepper. Blend thoroughly.
